sources.title: The Other Digari 2010
sources.description: Synopsis This movie follows a boy who lives with his mother in a village. The boy has lost his father and needs to travel to Tehran with his soon to be stepfather. Cast: Mohammad Reza Forutan, Merila Zare'i, Mehran Rajabi, Asghar Naghizadeh, Mohammad Ali Miandar, Faramarz Roshanayi, Nobar Ghanbarian Title: The Other | Digari (2010) Directed by: Mehdi Rahmani Date of birth: 1 february 1979, Isfahan, Iran Writing credits: Mehran Kashani Music: Babak Mirzakhani Year: 2010 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 84 min.
